statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-2) and (10,11).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{11}-{\left(-{2}\right)}}}{{{10}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=\frac{{13}}{{-{{4}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{13}}{{4}} (if it's not already reduced)
